MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the WA9 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Irwin Road, Marina Avenue and surrounding streets.  This is causing flickering and reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified an underground cable fault on Olga Road and we now expect your supply to be restored by 9am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:37am on 28th January 2021.
